description: Football-clad Tom Steele [in a non-sexual role] spies Kevin Wiles on a weight bench in another room of Falcon House. Tom watches as Jim Bentley deep-throats Kevin from behind. The two horn dogs 69 on the bench. Leading up to Jim finger-fucking Kevin's big-puckered butt hole. In big close-ups, Jim is seen rimming Kevin and then stuffing the hole with very large love beads.
title: Behind Closed Doors, Scene #03
